    Learn to speak English fluently online

    Trial lesson 30 minutes.

    I know that learning another language can be frustrating and hard. Therefore, I am using all possible ways and strategies to help my students with learning the language and keep their motivation up. 👊

    How the class is organized

    During my lessons, I will be giving you as much time as I can for you to speak because I believe it is an important part of learning any language.

    • See notable improvement of your speaking, vocabulary, and grammar
    • You will feel more confident and relaxed when speaking English
    • You will get corrections and suggestions on vocabulary and sentence structures
    • You will have a clear understanding of what you need to focus on
    • Finally, you will achieve your learning goals!

    I focus on what's really important

    Lots of practice

    All classes are held in English only, starting from the very beginning

    🤟

    Without cramming

    And extra water, which distracts from the study. You will learn to understand the language

    💣

    Friendly atmosphere

    We can discuss whatever you want. Any topic of your choice

    🤗

    Knowledge control

    If you do not understand something, Vlad will provide you with all possible ways to do so!

    🎓

    Support 24/7

    Any problems? You can text me anytime and we can find the best solution!

    🔥

    Free cancellation

    It is absolutely free just 4 hours before our scheduled lesson! Just tell me beforehand!

    💸

    Let's meet! 🤝

    My name is Vlad, and I am an experienced and TESOL Certified English Teacher. I always had a passion for English. That was the reason why I have decided to become a professional English teacher.

    I graduated from the University of Arizona where I received my Teaching English as a Foreign Language Certificate and I took some English Proficiency Exams like TOEFL and Duolingo to prove my knowledge of the language.

    I have already been teaching and helping students for a few years. And I am still carrying this teaching passion in me and I am trying to make my students fall in love with English every lesson.

    What services do I offer?

    Trial Lesson 🎯

    Duration: 30 min

    2 - 3 lessons per week

    • Evaluation of your level
    • Finding your weaknesses
    • Suggested learning plan
    • Recommendations on self-study resources
    • A first taste of a lesson

    Price: $5

    Chit-Chat Class 💬

    Duration: 30 - 90 min

    2 - 3 lessons per week

    • Regular practice
    • Any topic you like
    • Easy-going conversation
    • Friendly atmosphere
    • Analyze of mistakes

    Price: from $11

    Conversational English 😎

    Duration: 30 - 90 min

    2 - 3 lessons per week

    • Boost confidence in speaking
    • 100+ different topics
    • Learning new words
    • Lots of speaking practice!
    • Noticed progress after several lessons!

    Price: from $14

    Duration: 30 - 90 min

    2 - 3 lessons per week
